website_summaries.verdict: With a higher-resolution display, thin chassis, and up-to-date components, the Apple MacBook Pro 15-inch with Retina Display is the new king of high-end desktop replacement laptops.
pros: Ready for Mac OS X Mountain Lion
cons: Not all apps currently work well with Retina display

customer_reviews.title: ... I was unaware that the screen would be damaged like this. It’s only slightly noticeable during normal use
customer_reviews.text: Everything is going smooth with the computer except I was unaware that the screen would be damaged like this. It’s only slightly noticeable during normal use, except if you’re viewing something with a dark screen. It looks like it’s just wear from being pushed up against its own keyboard when closed. If I was aware of this issue beforehand I would have purchased a different laptop. I need it for school and don’t have the time to exchange so I guess I will just deal with it. For me it’s a minor inconvenience. Like I said, everything else is working great!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Your computer restarted because of a problem
customer_reviews.text: I bought an Apple MacBook Pro 15.4-Inch Laptop ( Mid - 2012) with Retina Display. I also purchased Logic pro x for my personal recording projects. But every time I am using Logic pro x, the laptops keeps shutting down. It keeps off until I manually force it to re start. Sometimes it trying to re-start and goes off again. When it's finally on, It then displays the this message "Your computer restarted because of a problem" It is difficult for me to finish any project due to the above problem. Does anyone know how to fix this?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best computer I have owned
customer_reviews.text: I have been slowly moving from a PC to an Apple computer. I have used iPhones and iPad in my movement. This new computer is absolutely fabulous. So far haven't found anything I don't like about it. It is extremely fast and the screen is beyond comparison with anything else, to the extent that I rarely use my my desktop PC with a 24 1/2 inch monitor. The only problem I've had is learning to speak Apple rather than PC. I think once the transition is made it will be terrific. One thing for sure is that I'm never going back. Sometimes you may pay more for something but you actually get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Like new condition
customer_reviews.text: The laptop came in almost Perfect condition. No scratches or signs of wear or Tear. It just looked beautiful and like new. Since it is an older model though I spent the first 2-3 hours downloading updates and making sure everything was up to speed. Also does not come with a lot of the typical Mac apps initially but can be easily downloadable for free! Over all great product and great seller and I would for sure buy from him again!!
customer_reviews.author: Aisha Lyder

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! with 1 issue creeping up on me...
customer_reviews.text: Been using this MBPr for 6 months now, and so far it still runs quickly, smoothly, and reliably. One issue I'm beginning to notice, though, is that the trackpad may be needing a replacement soon. The problem seems to be pretty apparent amongst the community. So, you might want to keep that in mind when deciding to purchase this version. All the positives I have for this MBPr seem to have been addressed already in other reviews, so I won't be reiterating the same thing. Other than the trackpad issue (which is covered by Apple's warranty), enjoy your MBPr once you decide to switch to Apple from PC... Haha!
customer_reviews.author: tekim

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed with this lab top and the features ...
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this lab top and the features it holds. It allows me flexibility and space needed for my photos and videos. It was delivered on time, however the package was crushed at the end but no damage so far from computer. It allows me to expand my library and to do creative work that impress clients as well as familieis.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for the wife and the hardware and software are very good. Having some trouble transitioning from Windows, but that was entirely expected and does not reflect negatively on this product. I give the product 5 stars, but mention that 3 or 4 USB ports are better than 2, and that although the aluminum finish is very nice looking, it is more susceptible to dents, etc. than plastic. Screen is very very handsome and love the resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Garth C Harding

customer_reviews.title: This is what you've been looking for
customer_reviews.text: I waited a few months before I wrote this review to ensure that I fully understood the functionality of this machine. This laptop is my favorite laptop I've ever owned. This is a 6 year old laptop that doesn't show it's age a bit. The screen is as glorious as people above me and below me are saying. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: A&M

customer_reviews.title: Please DO NOT buy from MGL Electronics Storefront
customer_reviews.text: The item was listed as used - good condition but it was defective. I purchased this laptop less than a year ago and it has completely stopped working. Within a couple of months of purchasing, I started noticing problems with the screen. It gradually got worse and worse and MGL Electronics has been dismissive and not helpful. Don't waste your money or your time. Update: I found out the laptop was sold to me with a bad logic board which is an additional $600 fix.
customer_reviews.author: brael

customer_reviews.title: Best Mac Pro Ever...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using the Mac Pro Retina for 3 weeks now. It is so far the best Mac Pro have used so far. Have used the 11 inch and 13 inch as well. For me 15 inch makes more sense and gives me the extra screen size and commuting power which makes things a breeze. Suggestion. I did find the Battery not reflecting correct hours even after full charge. The MAX it would show is 2.30 hours. It should be close to 6 hours based on normal usage. These steps and apple forum helped. Hope Apple fixes this through a update for mountain lion. # Reset PRAM # Reset SMC
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: You probably don’t need a review to tell you this is a great machine
customer_reviews.text: You already know Apple makes great computers. I use this one for design and music creation, and it keeps up with all my processing needs, even when I have tons of apps open at the same time. The only time I’ve ever had to wait on it is when I was dealing with huge Photoshop files that were gigabytes big (so big they’re .psb or whatever, instead of regular .psd). Even then, the waiting was not unreasonable. You certainly won’t find a better 15-inch laptop from anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: James Miller

customer_reviews.title: I had to return it because it was very annoying. I don't think this went through a thorough ...
customer_reviews.text: The Laptop came with a noise coming from the fan. I had to return it because it was very annoying. I don't think this went through a thorough refurbishing process by an apple certified technician as claimed by the 3rd party vendor. The noise is easily noticeable. I would not buy again from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Less than a week after purchasing, it began giving me the BLACK screen Of Death. Occasionally it would start properly for all of 5 minutes. I spent quite a bit of time WITH Apple Support troubleshooting the problem. Nothing has worked. Waste of $1,000. I'm gonna try and get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: david1959

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: I decided to purchase this new Mac after my last MacBook Pro decided to stop working. The screen on this laptop is second to none. I travel a lot and watching movies/tv shows while on flights with the retina display is amazing. Working with photos is also crisper and easier to work with (I am not a pro photographer). Another impressive thing is the size compared to the standard MCP 15". This laptop is thin, lite and easy to travel with. All that being said I think this is more of a specialized laptop. This is an expensive machine and I wouldn't recommend it unless you plan to play HD games, edit video/photos or just have the money to spend.
customer_reviews.author: SMurray

customer_reviews.title: messed up speaker
customer_reviews.text: the left speaker is shot dead he gave me 40$ like that will do anything and this this sucks it will be my last MacBook pro probably
customer_reviews.author: karlos benitez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, awesome, awesome product!!!!! Great seller and laptop!!!! If you need an Apple laptop this is DEFINITELY the place to go with. Very good prices and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Tepig

customer_reviews.title: Liked it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for work. There are a few scratch at the bottom. But I am fine with it. So far very happy with it. Will give feedback again after couple months of usage. Battery lasts for 4 hours at full charge.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Just Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great laptop. I am not a computer whiz, but this has been easy to set up and easy to use. If I can do this anyone can. This laptop is replacing one that was stolen out of my house. I didn't read the model number so I did not get an exact replacement. The old one had a cd port. This one does not if that matters to you. The battery lasts and recharges easily. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: kmcclell

customer_reviews.title: Lasted for 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 6 months, screen started dying shortly after I would be unable to return it. Completely dead, Apple tech says logic board was going out and is out now, 600 to replace. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: mid

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laptop for iOS software development. My old MacBook Pro couldn't run the latest version of xCode, the IDE for programming on the Mac. Everything is great about it, but two things really made my day. It boots up in about 10 seconds! And it's very fast at everything. I have a 27" iMac about 3 years old and I think this new laptop runs about 5 times as fast.
customer_reviews.author: G. Richard Schlueter

customer_reviews.title: Very good condition
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Works as expected. Apple hardware quality. Some very tiny scratches but very good overall conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Laurent A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: What we got was every bit as good or even better than described.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Ahlstrom

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was perfect and delivered on-time
customer_reviews.text: Description was exactly as I expected. It even had MS Office loaded, as a bonus. Packaging was perfect and delivered on-time.
customer_reviews.author: Chi-Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great performance and functionality!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchase I've made and at an excellent price! Great performance and functionality. So far I've been very pleased with the overall experience this MB has provided.
customer_reviews.author: IAmBobbyV

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Came as described. Basically new. Great processor and hardware. I can now use Adobe CC without lag.
customer_reviews.author: I. Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Just go to Apple, it’s worth it
customer_reviews.text: 7 MONTH UPDATE: Computer is now a brick, do not buy from this company.. Was a bit disappointed in the quality of laptop when it arrived. Battery nearly dead, exterior and interior filthy with dirt (even fished out a dead fly from inside the back speakers) and moments after turning the laptop on I hear a struggled clicking noise. Open it up and the fan (and every other orfave) is covered in dust and grime. Not impressed. Only getting the two stars because of the Apple brand and because the device actually works! Here’s to spending my paycheck on an electronic dust collector!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great product, my old laptop was almost dead
customer_reviews.text: Great product, my old laptop was almost dead, I used to have Windows and I switched to macbook, I have been using it now for a few weeks, and no problems or glitches, what a relief to work on my business without delays or stoppages due to the computer. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dora Fejes

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop I've ever owned!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mac!! I had the 15 inch with the standard resolution screen before and this blows it out of the water! It is amazing!! Super sleek and sexy design and performance is great! Super fast and the screen is just mind blowingly crisp!! I would tell anyone and everyone to get this! Its one of the best investments I've ever made on a computer!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Flick

customer_reviews.title: 15" MacBook Pro Retina Display
customer_reviews.text: MacBook was listed as refurbished in very good condition and it arrived in better condition than I expected. So far there have been zero issues under heavy use. I'm very satisfied with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Regarding LG Screen..
customer_reviews.text: After I found Amazon send me a MacBook with LG screen, I called Apple because I saw comments about screen retention problems and found out that it was the problems exist with early-manufactured MacBooks only. Now the MacBooks even with the LG screen will not encounter the image retention problem. Apple had take all the old and problematic MacBook back so now you will not likely to buy a laptop with such issues. If you not sure, just call Apple and provide them your series number and if it falls into the catalog of such issues, they will replace it immediately. Those information assured me and I will keep this laptop. I will see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Very fast and powerfull and expensive.
customer_reviews.text: This macbook is just perfect for me, I can have my gaming sessions playing the latest games on the market using High and Very High graphics (via bootcamp). It works perfectly for music (DJing and production softwares) photography, videos and heavy tasks too. Pros: - Powerfull processor and GPU - Very thin - The display is incredible - Handles games easily. Cons: - Heats up a bit but nothing of the charts, it's pretty acceptable. Apple should have an extra care on that, but the MBP family is known to be hot. - Price I would recommend this for music/photography/video enthusiasts or anyone that needs a fast and powerfull machine.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Utech

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mac from amazon as two days shipping was less than almost all other vendors and apple direct. The mac arrived in perfect condition. This was given as a gift and the person I gave it to has been very happy with the computer and cannot believe how fast the flash memory, hard drive combo is.
customer_reviews.author: Coolcat

customer_reviews.title: Apple has done it again
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the rMBP 15" for 1 week, mostly for writing blogs, papers and some CAD work. I unfortunately have to use MS Office for work and have been disappointed in their lack of upgrades. The text is "fuzzy" and sometimes hard to read. I know that it will be corrected, but when. All other apps that I use are working fine. The display/graphics is flawless and renders models perfectly. The battery life is as stated. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: REVJWH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The computer itself was in good shape everything works flawless , the charger they sent was my only concern it looked old and worn out . But the laptop I just daily and love it
customer_reviews.author: David Rico

customer_reviews.title: Easier to see and read! Crisp even on lowest resolution
customer_reviews.text: The screen is the #1 reason to get this. CRISP even when its set to the lowest (biggest fonts) resolution. IF you are thinking about getting a Macbook Pro because you *think* it will be easier to read/see.... then you are absolutely right. Get it. At 43, my eyes are not what they used to be.... the screen is a gorgeous sight to behold.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: What a rocket toy
customer_reviews.text: This is just inexplicable how great this machine functions. Thank you Apple for a such product. I spent thousands dollars on it, but man - I wish I knew before of this great quality product. Everything's so smooth. 512SSD, 16GB RAM, 2.7GHz iCore 7, oh my... Everything's so smooth. Thank you, Apple! Thank you, Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: RMP_Amaz0n

customer_reviews.title: Love IT
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT. GREAT CONDITION AND GREAT DEAL. RECOMMENDED AND ITS A SPEEDY UPGRADE AND WELL WORTH THE PRICE TAG. RETINA IS THE WAY TO GO COLLEGE STUDENTS ESPECIALLY
customer_reviews.author: norman whaley

customer_reviews.title: great performance and display
customer_reviews.text: I like resolution of display so great and performance so good in copy large files and good in gaming I ordered this laptop for used with adobe lightroom and photoshop and look great but some of application till now didn't upgrade their apps for retina resolution I get tis laptop after discounted price because newer version released
customer_reviews.author: ali abdullah albuhassan

customer_reviews.title: best laptop of 2012
customer_reviews.text: this is quite the power horse yet very good battery life spc for its powerful CPU and GPU. the resolution on it is the best and most clear laptop screen period!! also mac OS is very fast and lag free with the most modern user interface yet still have some restriction compared to windows spc on the apps compatibility side.
customer_reviews.author: Fahd Almohid

customer_reviews.title: Excellent seller, excellent machine.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!, I'm very happy with this model and the conditions of the product. It works very well. Physically is in excellent conditions and the performance is really awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Cuauhtemoc Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: The hardware is excellent. The retina screen is the best I used ...
customer_reviews.text: The hardware is excellent. The retina screen is the best I used and the SSD makes the retina Macbook Pro extremely fast. The Mavericks OS and a few packaged programs like iTunes has a few glitches but work well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Ray M.

customer_reviews.title: More than enough computer.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a fantastic used laptop for school and research projects. The Apple OS works seamlessly with the solid state hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: J. Reiser

customer_reviews.title: Great but expensive
customer_reviews.text: If you can afford high quality and great performance and want a high resolution screen on your laptop (versus a monitor), I recommend this laptop. It's boot up time is wickedly fast. The laptop itself is functional and light (in weight) and very pleasant to use. It's too bad, though, you have to spend an extra $30 to get an adapter for wired Ethernet. Because of the high price and the lack of an Ethernet port, I am giving it 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Phil K

customer_reviews.title: Great for older eyes - and the impatient type
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my retired dad - I replaced his 7 year old Dell laptop. needless to say he is in love with his new computer. He loves the retina display and the fact the computer boots up in less than 10 seconds. Yes I am a converted Mac fan after years of working with windows
customer_reviews.author: Hillfamily

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great refurbished laptop, running good for the price. Handle all my iPhone App and Web design and development need.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Do

customer_reviews.title: I love it. The MacBook Pro is incredibly powerful
customer_reviews.text: It's been an incredible machine...I love it. The MacBook Pro is incredibly powerful...there is more than enough memory and processing power to handle the toughest tasks easily and quietly. Well done Mr. Jobs and Mr. Cook...and everyone at Apple..
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Mercieca

customer_reviews.title: Better Condition Than Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought a MacBook Pro with condition listed as 'Good', and I'm really impressed with the condition. It's better than I expected. Would buy from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Emptywalls

customer_reviews.title: Awesomely fast
customer_reviews.text: Gone are the frustrations of waiting. This computer substantially beats my 2 year old macbook pro and my 6 year old iMac. I even have Windows 8 running through "parallels" and I instantly flip back and forth between Windows and Mac. There are apparently some minor problems with older software such as "Toast" but none have affected me yet. I love this laptop
customer_reviews.author: DonnieG

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for a few months then developed sudden death syndrome.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic laptop!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second macbook pro and i am very happy with it. Retina display is great and is amazing for photo and video work. Flash architecture is very fast and quiet. Laptop makes virtually no noise even when the fans are on. Can't say enough good things about it.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: The best Lap Top on the Market
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about some of he other reviewers that spoke of long refresh times upon wake up, my computer wakes up in a snap. The speed and display makes this the best lap to date, I'd pay a lot more for this but glad the price is reasonable for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Londe

customer_reviews.title: rMBP is nice machine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rMBP couple of months back and I am using it as dev machine. The screen is brilliant and addictive once you use to this screen, it is very difficult to go back to normal screen. This gets warm to hot often and considering its spec (quad core) it is understandable but it is not lap-able. Weight is another thing but considering it is 15" and build quality, it is tolerable but i wish it would have shed some weights. We use Macs as our dev system at [...]and color reproduction of rMBP is great and looking at bright orange theme of [...] is vibrant and pleasing. Thanks, Senthil ([...])
customer_reviews.author: Senthilkumar

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend Silicone Valley Computer https
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this computer, is a like-new computer, it is a "7 stars" service. I highly recommend Silicone Valley Computer
customer_reviews.author: jvilaire

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Retina Display is amazing, but some software (particularly Office for Mac) doesn't play well with it. Excel is slightly fuzzier than with my old MacBook. Couldn't tell much difference with Word. However, the real deal is Solid State Drive. Finally, a computer operates at near the speed of your smartphone, i.e., click a button and the software is open. No long waits for the computer to turn on, off, or software to load or to shut down. If you lack patience, this is the laptop for you.
customer_reviews.author: apple fan

customer_reviews.title: MY FIRST AND PERFECT MACBOOK PRO!!! Love it
customer_reviews.text: This Mac is in PERFECT CONDITION, like brand new. I love my laptop so much, the best I ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolás Mariano Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: A different Computer
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Mac ever It's amazing, I couldn't buy the bigger one, but still it's a great computer It's gonna take me a while to take all the juice Cons: Even when it's amazing, I couldn't buy the bigger one. More space would it better
customer_reviews.author: Fede

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Started to work with the Maxine looks pretty good so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: upgraded
customer_reviews.text: i had a macbook pro late 2011 2.2ghz i7 500gb hard drive.. sold it to upgrade and glad i did! unluckily.. i got the LG screen notorious for the Image Retention and i have noticed NO IMAGE RETENTION.. fingers crossed.. So far so good...
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great experience, I would not hesitate buy from this buyer again.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was as advertised, the only nit picky comment I have is that the previous buyer did not clean off the computer when I got it, and I had to do reformat hard drive and reinstall Mavericks since the computer was still attached to the previous owner's account. Overall very pleasant transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Skills with Phil

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been thoroughly enjoying my MacBook. Huge screen, great battery life and came in a TON of bubble wrap. I’m thankful for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Blaxican83

customer_reviews.title: Beginner Mac
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great except the battery. Seems to be switched out for a lower grade battery.
customer_reviews.author: Kalani Aquino

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience with my first mac i return to pc
customer_reviews.text: Ship great but this model have defective with screen mine was bought used 9/10 condition outside but outside i get screen off or black screen sometimes and i have to shut it down and turn it on again this laptop is bad MC975LL/A model mid 2012 dont buy it. before check issues with the model. I ask for rufund and seller says that i have three months with the laptop and i cant return it.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Gil Duran

customer_reviews.title: Display issues: Image retention and Flicker
customer_reviews.text: My Screen had image retention and bad flickering. This is not advertised so beware all who purchase Macbook Pro Retinas 2012-2015
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel_us

customer_reviews.title: Works great and still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and still going strong! The screen will have ghosting effects if you leave the laptop screen on for an hour or longer; but Apple said its normal for these screens. Other than that, works great!
customer_reviews.author: Wisconsinite

customer_reviews.title: ... got here in time and safe and was just like new! Love it and was a great price
customer_reviews.text: My new computer got here in time and safe and was just like new! Love it and was a great price!
customer_reviews.author: EJ Wall

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: It restarts by it self for unknown reasons, but it has not been a big issue for me. Nice product
customer_reviews.author: Darius S. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Best Mac I've ever purchased!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was excellent, as usual for products from Amazon. This computer is a beautiful beast of a machine (which also has very quiet fan movement). The compact flat design is wonderful for such a powerful machine. The retina display is the brightest, clearest screen I have ever used. It is pricey, but you definitely get what you pay for. Looking forward to lots of video and photo editing on this.
customer_reviews.author: JamesK

customer_reviews.title: Heaven
customer_reviews.text: I am loving my new used computer. It is a great steep up from my old 2008 MacBook 13"
customer_reviews.author: Tom Norcross

customer_reviews.title: The most beautiful macbook ever
customer_reviews.text: This computer is worth every penny, it is very thin, beautiful, and very light. The thing that is the most awesome thing is the retina display, the screen is so clear, just like the iphone 4. The webcam is pretty legit and once you get used to the macbook, it is so easy and so awesome to use. I recommend this to everyone who needs a new computer.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice refurbished Macbook (2012)old version and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top Shelf Product and company definiely
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous ..very highly recommend..I M very very satisfied..smart company to deal with..love it
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: This macbook pro rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome buy, I'm using it right now to write this review. Owner was very nice and courteous when I contacted them, even expedited the shipping for free.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worry free purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great price, item as described, seller is highly professional. Very pleased with my purchase and would not hesitate to buy another device from them.
customer_reviews.author: Tischann

customer_reviews.title: MacBook Pro ME665LL/A
customer_reviews.text: I am more accostomed to a windows based PC for the past 20 years, but i am getting used to the MAC, and the speed and display are great. I still have some basics to teach myself how to do, but it is fun learning.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T

customer_reviews.title: Very bad experience
customer_reviews.text: I don't recommend buying a refurbished MacBook. Have to reset the SMC a few times a night.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Riazi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Laptop, love the Retina display
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Laptop, love the Retina display, what a difference from my earlier Apple laptop. It's fast, and easy on the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Joe R.

customer_reviews.title: Apple MacBook Pro ME665LL/A 15.4-Inch Laptop with Retina Display (NEWEST)
customer_reviews.text: I bought Apple MacBook Pro Laptop from Amazon recently and what a joy it is to use. It has everything a Laptop must have and more. I used to be a PC person at one time and bought too many HP computers. Everything was awful, too many to list. Sales office at Philippines, Service in India, Mangers in Canada and Corporate offices in California who would never listen. I'm so glad with MacBook Pro that this is my third Mac. I also own, iPhone 5, Mini iPad etc. Specifications have been discussed by others. I fully approve this and other Apple products over all others, they are the pioneers.
customer_reviews.author: Noah A. Lefevre

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great computer. Very fast, and does everything I need. I'm using it as a Pro Tools workstation and it keeps up with huge music mixing sessions and even sound mixing for films.
customer_reviews.author: justin Newton

customer_reviews.title: No discription needed its a brand
customer_reviews.text: The name Apple itself means quality. well based on price it sometimes is expensive. The Macbook works perfectly, till now no issues yet. The display is really amazing. Although I thought having NVIDIA GPU may consume more battery but this one gives really good battery life of around 6+hours based on workload.
customer_reviews.author: VIDYA SINGH

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this machine
customer_reviews.text: These dudes came through in the clutch!!! I was a little worried that it was the mid 2012 version, being that its now almost 4 years old, but honestly its a dope piece of machinery. Apple is amazing, and its my first Apple laptop after being a PC user for the past 20 years its great to finally have a product thats built to last and doesn't hardly ever crash. Zero scratches or dents on the laptop other than a few minor normal wear scratches on the bottom of the laptop where someone would place it on their desk, so its not even noticeable. And the best part about this purchase was the price!
customer_reviews.author: TSOBK

customer_reviews.title: Love Apple
customer_reviews.text: We have bought several new laptops latey and the staff love their new Macs. The laptop is very powerful and great for our web design staff. Excellent buy & cheaper then from Apple directly.
customer_reviews.author: Rick J.

customer_reviews.title: loving it
customer_reviews.text: Loving it....who doesnt....the screen is so clear that any other laptop screen just doesnt cut it anymore. I had to get the ipad mini with retina!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous SF

customer_reviews.title: Great but...
customer_reviews.text: This computer is excellent, but I was disappointed to open it up and see that the liquid damage indicators had been triggered. I couldn't see any sign of corrosion, but this still means I can't get any warranty on this computer. :/
customer_reviews.author: bp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, really looks like new, clean software, ready to be used. i certainly recommend this seller 100%
customer_reviews.author: neville roman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent laptop
customer_reviews.text: Had a hard choice between the 15" retina and the 13" air. Really glad I picked this one as I really like larger screen. Since this has flash storage it boots very quick - about 15 seconds. The 2 thunderbolt (mini-display port) makes it very easy to hook up 2 external displays. Resolution is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: slackiam

customer_reviews.title: down arrow key is broken looks like it was pushed in and to the right
customer_reviews.text: Couple scratches, down arrow key is broken looks like it was pushed in and to the right.. but it still works. Otherwise computer is in great condition
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy mcnair

customer_reviews.title: ''' My Baby
customer_reviews.text: This computer rocks. Have a lot of apple devices- We who own them know they are the ultimate in PCs . I could go on and on about the details but the speed and clarity -- Oh My-- Suck it up and pay the few extra bucks -- you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: gjb

customer_reviews.title: Would not expect less from apple
customer_reviews.text: Excellent computer. If thinking about purchasing insurance find a college kid or someone who can get the student discount and buy it straight from apple and you'll be able to get it for about $100.00 cheaper than amazon.
customer_reviews.author: E & A

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good The backwardness was not the fault of the seller, but the UPS.
customer_reviews.author: Edson Lennon

customer_reviews.title: Simply great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, i really love it. I recommend it to everyone!!! I had never have a macbook before and i thought it would be difficult for me to adapt to Mac OS, but it really intuitive!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: The performance is fantastic and I love how thin and light it is. Battery life is fantastic and the mag safe adapter is the best thing since sliced bread. The touchpad is responsive and gestures help you move around the laptop effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal, needed to upgrade from 13" Pro, and this did the trick beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: damvit

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first mac, and it's simply great. It's very fast for turning on and opening applications. As I needed Windows for my work, I've installed it with Bootcamp and it was easy - no troubles.
customer_reviews.author: Rey Coaguila

customer_reviews.title: Having some crashes
customer_reviews.text: There seems to be an issue with this machine crashing. I have had to reboot at least once each day as the cursor (track pad) goes unstable. This morning, mail failed to start and then could not even do a normal or hard shut down from the display. Had to shut down with the power button, not good with the backup hard drive in use. Update as of 1/29 - instability with external trackpad has been reduced to just random occurrence. Have not had any hard crashes since initial report. Overall very satisfied. There have been 2 updates which may have addressed the hard crashes.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie P. Keiski

customer_reviews.title: What every laptop should aspire to be!  Another great Apple product.
customer_reviews.text: What every laptop should aspire to be! No disappointments here. Compared to previous laptops I have owned & used, this is lightyears better. Everything works as advertised. Great screen with retina display, fast, dependable, and a great operating system that Windows aspires to match.
customer_reviews.author: Nvaner

customer_reviews.title: Love my retina mac
customer_reviews.text: Too many years wasted in windows pc. It was easy to migrate into mac. It's just fantastic! Boot time 14 sec.
customer_reviews.author: sjgv

customer_reviews.title: awesome computer
customer_reviews.text: Great computer i would highly recommend it to anyone who is considering it right now
customer_reviews.author: R. Nico

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is that it is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: ANTOINE THANNBERGER

customer_reviews.title: Graduation gift for granddaughter.  Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for graduation using the Amazon Store extended pay plan. She loves it lots. That makes me a success.
customer_reviews.author: sailor lady

customer_reviews.title: MacBppk Pro Retina Display
customer_reviews.text: I am an IT guy and use it everyday for 5-6 hours after office hours. I would say its better than any laptop in current market. Nice design, sleek and light weight. Its capable of handling anything you trow at this.
customer_reviews.author: navnit

product_meta.title: Apple MacBook Pro MC975LL/A 15.4-Inch Laptop with Retina Display (OLD VERSION)
product_meta.description:
​Apple MacBook Pro Retina Display MC976LL/A 2.60GHz Quad Core i7-3720QM Processor, 512GB SSD, 8 GB of onboard 1600 MHz DDR3L SDRAM, dual graphics processors -- a NVIDIA GeForce GT 650M with 1 GB of dedicated GDDR5 memory and an "integrated" Intel HD Graphics 4000 graphics processor that shares system memory, 15.4" Retina screen and OS 10.8 Mountain Lion installed. These units are professionally refurbished. The laptop is completely "wiped" and then the Operating System is re-installed. All functionality is fully checked and they are professionally cleaned. Remaining Apple warranty. This MacBook is in Grade A condition showing virtually no signs of use. Included Accessories: Battery and AC adapter, manual (Does not include software disks) This is a very economical way to buy an extremely reliable Apple MacBook Pro! Shipping Shipping within the 48 US Contiguous States by Fedex is Free

AMAZON.COM

8 GB DDR3 RAM; 256 GB Flash Storage
Mac OS X v10.8 Mountain Lion, 7 Hour Battery Life, Maximum Memory Capacity: 16 GB
